abstract: Will Shortz announces the winners of the "'Cross'" Words contest and talks about his favorite comments.
snippet: Will Shortz announces the winners of the "'Cross'" Words contest and talks about his favorite comments.
lead_paragraph: SPECIAL POST - The entries to Patrick Berry's "'Cross' Words Contest" last week came from as far away as Norway, Israel and the South Pole. ("Best puzzle ever!" the last wrote.) Two service members from Afghanistan - from Helmund Province and Kandahar - separately sent solutions.
